definitions.definition: A line that is tangent to the velocity of flow of a fluid ; equivalent to the path of a specific particle in that flow.
On a weather chart , a line that is tangent to the flow of the wind.

main_definition: ( physics ) A line that is tangent to the velocity of flow of a fluid ; equivalent to the path of a specific particle in that flow.
secondary_definitions: ( meteorology ) On a weather chart , a line that is tangent to the flow of the wind.
